== Google Summer of Code ==

=== NOTE ===
This list isn't Ubuntu-projects exclusive, '''all students from GSoC''' are invited to add their blog here :) You can mark your project as Ubuntu-related with { * } (without spaces) next to your blog link.

=== 2010 ===
You are welcome to add your student blog here. Please keep the countries in alphabetical order.
